NOTICE

This distribution includes data derived from Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE®) Records.

Source of CVE Records:
  - CVEProject/cvelistV5 (CVE Record Format JSON)

CVE content is made available under the CVE Program Terms of Use.
A copy of the CVE Terms of Use is provided with this distribution in:
  - CVE_TERMS_OF_USE.txt

Trademarks:
  - CVE is a trademark and the CVE logo is a registered trademark of The MITRE Corporation.

About this distribution:
  - The files in this release are a transformed/normalized representation of CVE Records (e.g., Parquet,
    indexing, and other convenience structures) to support efficient local querying.
  - Any additional derived fields (such as embeddings, indexes, or computed metadata) are produced by
    this project and are not part of the official CVE Records.

No endorsement:
  - This project is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by The MITRE Corporation or the CVE Program.

Warranty disclaimer:
  - This distribution is provided “AS IS”, without warranties or conditions of any kind. See
    CVE_TERMS_OF_USE.txt for the full terms and disclaimers.

Project licensing:
  - The code used to build this distribution is licensed separately under the MIT License (see LICENSE).
